item.title: Apple will reportedly release artificial intelligence features in October, weeks after iOS 18 update
item.description: The company split the Apple Intelligence features from the initial iOS 18 launch due to concerns over their stability, a Bloomberg report said.

item.title: I wore the Samsung Galaxy Ring for 7 days — and it upstaged my Apple Watch Series 9
item.description: The Galaxy Ring is Samsung's new foray into finger-based wearables like Oura, and it's an impressive first effort.
